title: Nelson: The Public and Private Life of Horatio Viscount Nelson
description: This fulsome biography is based on the reflections of Nelson, as told by himself, his relations and his friends. This highly readable biography of Britain's greatest admiral takes us from Nelson's rise through the naval ranks and popular glory to an eyewitness account of his fatal wound at the Battle of Trafalgar in 1805.
author: G. Lathom Browne
